caption:
I never thought I’d lose so much hair after giving birth…

My postpartum hair journey has been emotional. Like many moms, I experienced major hair thinning in the months after having my baby. It was hard to accept, and it definitely affected my confidence.

That’s why I’m starting my journey with Kerotin — a brand made to help with postpartum hair loss and support healthy hair growth. I’ve seen real results from other women, and I’m so hopeful this will be a turning point for me too.

If you’re a mama going through something similar — I see you. You’re not alone. And it’s okay to take care of yourself too.

Follow along — I’ll be sharing updates as I go!

#Kerotin #PostpartumHairLoss #HairRecovery #MomLife #HairJourney #KerotinPartner
